comments:
Given code:

public class Exposer {
	private void foo() {
		new Generic(Exposer.class);
	}
}

class Generic<T> {
	Generic(Class<? extends T> clazz) {
		
	}
}

Infer type arguments fails with the error trace below.  However, replace the
constructor call with "new Generic(getClass())", and the inferrer finds a valid
solution: "new Generic<Object>(getClass())".  Instantiating on <Object> would
also work on the code above.
